mapper.select: SELECT prg_no, prg_nm, prg_content, cns_no, prg_nope, prg_cd, prg_schdl, prg_nmtm, prg_dow FROM grprograms WHERE prg_aprv = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grprograms (prg_nm, cns_no, prg_cd, prg_nope, prg_content, prg_start, prg_end, prg_hr, req_end, prg_dow, prg_nmtm) VALUES (#{prg_nm}, #{cns_no}, #{prg_cd}, #{prg_nope}, #{prg_content}, #{prg_start}, #{prg_end}, #{prg_hr}, #{req_end}, #{prg_dow}, #{prg_nmtm})
INSERT INTO grschedule (prg_no, prg_ymd, prg_hr) VALUES (#{prg_no}, #{prg_ymd}, #{prg_hr})
mapper.select: SELECT prg_no FROM grprograms WHERE cns_no = #{cns_no} ORDER BY prg_no DESC LIMIT 1
